casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Roger SMITH. No. 411P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 8, 2007. Robert Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Sam Currin, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th day of August 2007 by Defendant for Appropriate Relief:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 8th day of November 2007."
